name: Long Ball Ball
description:
Subscribe to Paolul!!

Ball ball is an Iconic Creature featured in Paolul's Videos. 

So i make a simple Game out of it, Basically you pick up this Hanger which has different Colors, Yellow (1 points), Blue (2 points) & Red (3 Points).

Don't hesitate and take on the challenge on who can make The longest ball ball of All time!!!
